message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. I believe it will be valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand the value of the product to you, but I am still unable to meet you at $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $14,000?
